points.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
points.status: The Terms of Use states that 'You agree not to post any abusive, obscene, vulgar, slanderous, hateful, threatening, sexually-orientated or any other material that may violate any laws be it of your country, the country where "Planet Minecraft" is hosted, USA, or International Law.'

points.title: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time
points.status: 'We log visitor IPs to prevent artificially inflating content stats, views, and to help prevent repeat malicious or inappropriate activities. View logs are flushed / deleted within 90 days.'

points.title: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
points.status: 'We may change these at any time and we’ll do our utmost in informing you, though it would be prudent to review this regularly yourself as your continued usage of "Planet Minecraft" after changes mean you agree to be legally bound by these terms as they are updated and/or amended.'

points.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
points.status: '"Planet Minecraft" shall not be held responsible for any hacking attempt that may lead to the data being compromised.'

points.title: This service takes credit for your content
points.status: The Terms of Use states that 'By uploading, posting or otherwise transmitting through or to our website any content, you grant to us, our successors and assigns, a non-exclusive, world-wide, royalty free, perpetual, non-revocable license to use or distribute such content in any manner otherwise than as stated in our Privacy Policy.'
